name: jerusalem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the city claimed by Israel and Palestine as their capital, in the central part of Israel and the southwestern part of the Palestinian West Bank territory: The hostess was from Jerusalem and her husband from Nablus, a region famous for its sweets. Titus Flavius Vespasianus, the son of Vespasian, led the siege of Jerusalem in 70 A.D.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Jerusalem the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Jerusalem.That appears to rule out any immediate discussion on the future of Jerusalem, on which both sides remain firmly divided.
